amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Inspector General of the Central Intelligence Agency to conduct an audit of all telephone and electronic communications between the Central Intelligence Agency and the Office of the Vice President that relate to weapons of mass destruction obtained or developed by Iraq preceding Operation Iraqi Freedom on or after September 11, 2001.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-176 to direct the Inspector General of the Central Intelligence Agency to conduct an audit of all telephone and electronic communications between the CIA and Office of the Vice President that relate to weapons of mass destruction obtained or developed by Iraq preceding Operation Iraqi Freedom.
